text: Empire Records is a 1995 teen romantic comedy movie. The subject is a record store in Delaware that tries to remain independent. Liv Tyler, Ren√©e Zellweger and Robin Tunney play store officials. Empire Records got negative reviews from critics. The movie performed very poorly in the box office. The movie was released in September 1995. Its soundtrack was rated excellent by many critics. title: Empire Records
